Constructor for initializing an error message indicating the deadline has expired.

<Note>
  `ExpiredDeadlineError` extends `PermissionBuilderError`, see the docs for
  PermissionBuilderError for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { ExpiredDeadlineError } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Parameters

### deadline

`number`
The expired deadline timestamp

### currentTime

`number`
The current timestamp
